## Checklist

- [ ] `bash -n` passes on all modified files
- [ ] Tests pass (`bash tests/test_cli.sh`)
- [ ] ShellCheck clean (`shellcheck -S warning`)
- [ ] JSON configs validated
- [ ] README updated (if adding commands or config options)
- [ ] SKILL.md updated (if adding commands)
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated
